Great food for a hotel restaurant.

 I usually skip hotel restaurants. But we were staying at the Residence Inn next door and found this restaurant very...
Moda is located inside the Residence Inn hotel, as you walk in to the left, and they extend for the majority of the lobby. We went for happy hour ( sun-tue,...
Limited menu, but somewhat expected for a hotel restaurant. Following an unreasonably long wait for the food, one item was wrong and another was cold. Reply...
